name: Meganium
description: The Herb Pokémon. The fragrance of Meganium's flower soothes and calms emotions. In battle, this Pokémon gives off more of its becalming scent to blunt the foe's fighting spirit.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.description: This Pokémon does not suffer from any negative status ailments in harsh sunlight.
